alert.note: Alert for Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Aroostook County through 445 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Smyrna Mills, or 16 miles northeast of Patten, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Houlton, Smyrna, Dudley Township, Smyrna Mills, Littleton, Oakfield, New Limerick, Ludlow, Merrill, Dyer Brook, Hersey, Dudley, Webbertown, Saint Croix and Moro Plantation. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 285 and 297. State Highway 11 near Knowles Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
